text: The term Bee Hive can refer to: *Bee hive, an alternate spelling of the word beehive *Bee Hive, Alabama, an unincorporated community *The Bee-Hive (journal), a 19th-century British newspaper *Bee Hive Records, a jazz record label *Bee Hives, a 2004 album by Broken Social Scene of B-sides and rarities *Bee Hive (Peak), a mountain in Zion National Park, Utah
title: Bee Hive
